predicate.note: Frames file for 'squirm' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 49.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: ``She's being attacked by the demon,'' Mrs. Warren stagewhispers as the priest sprinkles holy water over the squirming woman, and the television camera grinds.

example.name: with path
example.text: John always squirms his way out of cleaning his room.
example.arg: his way out of cleaning his room
